text:
Summary by الوطن Dr. Shawqi Allam, the Mufti of the Republic, stressed that celebrating the birth of Jesus Christ by Muslims is legitimate and inviolable unless the celebration is contrary to Sharia because it is an expression of joy in it, just as Share menu More
